detail.title: Privacy Policy
detail.content:
Fika Holdings Pte. Ltd. built Fika — the female-focused AI social & dating app as a Free app. This SERVICE is provided by Fika Holdings Pte. Ltd. at no cost and is intended for use as is.

This page is used to inform visitors regarding our policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decides to use our Service.

If you choose to use our Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy. The Personal Information that we collectis used for providing and improving the Service. We will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy.

detail.title: Information Collection and Use
detail.content:
For a better experience, while using our Service, we may require you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information. The information we request will be retained by us and used as described in this privacy policy.

We will collect your complete profile as data; this includes name, your gender, where you are from, what your occupation is, your height, your descriptive tags (characteristics, dating style, interests), what gender you are interested in. This data (excluding your name) is then used to calculate a feature representation with our AI that will be used for improving our recommendation algorithm such that you and our other users will see better profiles tailored to your preferences.

We will also collect your scrolling actions as data; this means we will track what profiles you dislike and like (on the like scale) and use this data in conjunction with our AI to improve our recommendation algorithm such that you and our other users will see better profiles tailored to your preferences.

We will also collect chat aggregate data which includes messages sent and its frequency, average response time and messages received and its frequency. This means we do not collect any data such as specific chat messages, which are encrypted and stored in our Firebase database only for you to be able to retrieve chat history. The data is also used for the purpose of improving our AI and better the experience of our users in the recommendation algorithm mentioned before, as well as the future feature in social spot suggestions.

The app does use third-party services that may collect information used to identify you.

Link to privacy policy of third party service providers used by the app:

  • Google Play Services
  • AdMob
  • Google Analytics for Firebase
  • Firebase Crashlytics
  • Facebook

detail.title: Location Tracking
detail.content: We will only use the location tracking for the Discovery screen — this is the screen where you are provided with all the users in our userbase. This is to serve you the people within your vicinity and prevent the cases where two people might be on the other side of the country or even the world. Any other time during the app, we don’t use the location at all — you will be able to chat freely, edit your profile and use our other features that will come out in the future.

detail.title: Log Data
detail.content: We want to inform you that whenever you use our Service, in a case of an error in the app we collect data and information (through third-party products) on your phone called Log Data. This Log Data may include information such as your device Internet Protocol (‘IP’) address, device name, operating system version, the configuration of the app when utilizing our Service, the time and date of your use of the Service, and other statistics.

detail.title: Cookies
detail.content:
Cookies are files with a small amount of data that are commonly used as anonymous unique identifiers. These are sent to your browser from the websites that you visit and are stored on your device’s internal memory.

This Service does not use these ‘cookies’ explicitly. However, the app may use third-party code and libraries that use ‘cookies’ to collect information and improve their services. You have the option to either accept or refuse these cookies and know when a cookie is being sent to your device. If you choose to refuse our cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of this Service.

detail.title: Service Provider
detail.content:
We may employ third-party companies and individuals due to the following reasons:

  • To facilitate our Service;
  • To provide the Service on our behalf;
  • To perform Service-related services; or
  • To assist us in analyzing how our Service is used.
We want to inform users of this Service that these third parties have access to your Personal Information. The reason is to perform the tasks assigned to them on our behalf. However, they are obligated not to disclose or use the information for any other purposes.

detail.title: Security
detail.content: We value your trust in providing us your Personal Information, thus we strive to use commercially acceptable means of protecting it. But remember that no method of transmission over the internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure and reliable, and we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

detail.title: Deletion of Data
detail.content: We allow all of our users the possibility of requesting to remove all their data effective immediately. If you contact us through any of our support channels with such a request, this action will be taken within 24 hours after validating it once.

detail.title: Links to Other Sites
detail.content: This Service may contain links to other sites. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that site. Note that we do not operate these external sites. Therefore, we strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of these websites. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services.

detail.title: Children’s Privacy
detail.content: These Services do not address anyone under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children under 18. If we discover that a child under 18 has provided us with personal information, we immediately delete this from our servers. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us so that we will be able to take the necessary actions.

detail.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
detail.content:
We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Thus, you are advised to review this page periodically for any changes. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.

This policy is effective as of 2020-09-17.

detail.title: Contact Us
detail.content: If you have any questions or suggestions about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us at info@fikaconnects.com.
